lead_paragraph: Verbal jousting exists in most sports, but the difference between acceptable trash talking and intolerable vitriol is nebulous, and it changes depending on the sport and the event.
snippet: Verbal jousting exists in most sports, but the difference between acceptable trash talking and intolerable vitriol is nebulous, and it changes depending on the sport and the event.
